name: Sun
description: The sun is by far the largest object in our solar system, containing 99.8% of the solar system's mass.

name: Mercury
description: Mercury is the closest planet to the sun and the smallest planet in the solar system â€” it is only a little larger than Earth's moon.

name: Venus
description: Venus is the second planet from the sun and is the hottest planet in the solar system.

name: Earth
description: Earth, our home planet, is the third planet from the sun. It is a water world with two-thirds of the planet covered by water. Earth's atmosphere is rich in nitrogen and oxygen and it is the only world known to harbor life.

name: Jupiter
description: Jupiter is the fifth planet from the sun and the largest planet in the solar system.

name: Saturn
description: Saturn is the sixth planet in our solar system. It is also known as ringed planet. Saturn is the second largest planet in our solar system in terms of size. it has a diameter of 1,20,536 kilometres. Saturn is nine times wider than the Earth.

name: Uranus
description: Uranus is the third largest planet in our solar system with a diameter of 51,118 kilometers. It has a dramatic tilt of nearly 90 degrees. Uranus is the third largest planet in our solar system with a diameter of 51,118 kilometers.

name: Neptune
description: Neptune is the farthest planet from the Sun. It has a average temperature around (-214 degree Celsius and -353 degrees F) that makes it one of the coldest planets of our solar system. It is the third largest planet in our solar system.
